release.module-fancy: A set of VA-API based elements for GStreamer

intro.p: The GStreamer team is pleased to announce the first release in the stable 1.12 release series. The 1.12 release series is adding new features on top of the 1.0, 1.2, 1.4, 1.6, 1.8 and 1.10 series and is part of the API and ABI-stable 1.x release series of the GStreamer multimedia framework.
Full release notes can be found here
Binaries for Android, iOS, Mac OS X and Windows will be provided in the next days.
